name: Strawberry Cheesecake
description: Our strawberry compote is the perfect balance of sweetness and tartness.

name: Blueberry Cheesecake
description: Our blueberry compote from juicy blueberries is full of flavor and vibrant colors

name: Mango Cheesecake
description: Our luscious mango compote is made from ripe mangos, complements the creamy cream cheese filling.

name: Cherry Cheesecake
description: The combination of our cherry compote and creamy cream cheese filling reminiscent the classic New York cheesecake.

name: Biscoff Cheesecake
description: Featuring a Biscoff butter infused in our silky smooth cream cheese filling on top a buttery Biscoff crust.

name: Oreo Cheesecake
description: Featuring crushed Oreo cookies blended in our silky-smooth cream cheese filling on top a buttery Oreo crust.

name: Matcha Cheesecake
description: Delightful fusion of high-quality Japan matcha powder blended in our silky-smooth cream cheese filling.

name: Matcha
description: Delightful fusion of high-quality Japan matcha powder blended in our silky-smooth cream cheese filling.

name: Espresso
description: Layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and rich mascarpone cream topped with a dusting of high-quality cocoa powder. Perfect balance of sweetness and bitterness!
